amendment.description: To modify and reauthorize the Better Utilization of Investments Leading to Development Act of 2018.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3826 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3826 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 3748. To modify and reauthorize the Better Utilization of Investments Leading to Development Act of 2018.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3826 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3826 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
